sqls.sql:
select t.MACHINECODE_S DYNAMICBALANCEMBARCODE_S,t.MATERIALCODE_S CURINGSPECCODE_S, m.DESCRIPTION materialdesc_s, count(t.MATERIALCODE_S) specCount from at_c_mm_curing_maintyre t left join PART m on t.MATERIALCODE_S = m.part_number where 1=1 and t.MACHINECODE_S is not null and t.record_flag_s='A' and t.PROESS_S='252010' <#if curingspeccode_s??> and t.MATERIALCODE_S like '%' || :curingspeccode_s || '%' </#if> <#if entbarcode_s??> and t.MACHINECODE_S=:entbarcode_s </#if>
<#if begin_created_time??&&end_created_time??> and t.OVERTIME_T between TO_DATE(:begin_created_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_created_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and t.S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> group by t.MATERIALCODE_S, m.DESCRIPTION,t.MACHINECODE_S

select count(1) from at_c_mm_curing_maintyre t left join PART m on t.MATERIALCODE_S = m.part_number where 1=1 and t.MACHINECODE_S is not null and t.record_flag_s='A' and t.PROESS_S='252010' <#if curingspeccode_s??> and t.MATERIALCODE_S like '%' || :curingspeccode_s || '%' </#if> <#if entbarcode_s??> and t.MACHINECODE_S=:entbarcode_s </#if>
<#if begin_created_time??&&end_created_time??> and t.OVERTIME_T between TO_DATE(:begin_created_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_created_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and t.S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> group by t.MATERIALCODE_S, m.DESCRIPTION,t.MACHINECODE_S

select t.MACHINECODE_S DYNAMICBALANCEMBARCODE_S,t.MATERIALCODE_S curingspeccode_s , t.ATPRESENTGRADECODE_S DYNAMICBALANCEGRADECODE_S,count(1) specCount from at_c_mm_curing_maintyre t left join PART m on t.MATERIALCODE_S = m.part_number where 1=1 and t.MACHINECODE_S is not null and t.record_flag_s='A' and t.PROESS_S='252010' <#if begin_created_time??&&end_created_time??> and t.OVERTIME_T between TO_DATE(:begin_created_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_created_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and t.S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if>
<#if curingspeccode_s??> and t.MATERIALCODE_S like :curingspeccode_s || '%' </#if>
<#if entbarcode_s??> and t.MACHINECODE_S=:entbarcode_s </#if>
group by t.MATERIALCODE_S ,t.ATPRESENTGRADECODE_S,t.MACHINECODE_S

sql.comment: 根据设备类型查询终检设备

sqls.sql: SELECT E.EQUIP_NAME, E.DESCRIPTION FROM EQUIPMENT E, UDA_EQUIPMENT UE WHERE 1 = 1 AND E .EQUIP_KEY = UE.OBJECT_KEY AND UE.S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s AND E.UDA_0='260005' order by E.EQUIP_NAME

sql.comment: 根据机台查询其中文名称

sqls.sql: SELECT E.DESCRIPTION FROM EQUIPMENT E, UDA_EQUIPMENT UE WHERE 1 = 1 AND E .EQUIP_KEY = UE.OBJECT_KEY AND UE.S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s and e.EQUIP_NAME=:barcode

select <#if curingmachinecode_s??> curingmachinecode_s, :curingmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if buildinmachinecode_s??> buildinmachinecode_s, :buildinmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if dynaBalancemachinecode_s??> dynaBalancemachinecode_s, :dynaBalancemachinecode_s, </#if> curingspeccode_s,description, count(1) speccount, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dpha1, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dpha1pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tdda1, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tdda1pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) a1, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) a1pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dpha, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dphapinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tdda, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tddapinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) a, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) apinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dpha0, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dpha0pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tdda0, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tdda0pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) a0, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) a0pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dphd, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dphdpinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tddd, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tdddpinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) erji, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) erjipinlv from ( SELECT q.*,m.Ro_Total_Rank_s,m.grade_code_s ,m.Balance_Total_Rank_s , ( SELECT MACHINECODE_S FROM at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M1 WHERE M1.TYREBARCODE_S = q.barcode_s AND M1.PROESS_S = '252005' AND ROWNUM < 2 ) buildinmachinecode_s, ( SELECT MACHINECODE_S FROM at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M1 WHERE M1.TYREBARCODE_S = q.barcode_s AND M1.PROESS_S = '252006' AND ROWNUM < 2 ) curingmachinecode_s, ( SELECT MACHINECODE_S FROM at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M1 WHERE M1.TYREBARCODE_S = q.barcode_s AND M1.PROESS_S = '252010' AND ROWNUM < 2 ) dynaBalancemachinecode_s from ( SELECT DISTINCT T.BARCODE_S, M .MATERIALCODE_S curingspeccode_s, P .DESCRIPTION, MAX (T .created_time_t) created_time_t FROM AT_D_QM_BALANDRRORESULT T, at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M, part P WHERE 1 = 1 AND T .barcode_s = M .TYREBARCODE_S (+) AND M .MATERIALCODE_S = P .part_number (+) AND M .PROESS_S = '252010' AND T .record_flag_s = 'A' <#if begin_created_time??&&end_created_time??> and t.CREATED_TIME_T between to_date(:begin_created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(:end_created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') </#if> <#if curingspeccode_s??> and P .part_number like :curingspeccode_s </#if> GROUP BY M .MATERIALCODE_S, P .DESCRIPTION, T .BARCODE_S ORDER BY barcode_s) q, AT_D_QM_BALANDRRORESULT M WHERE q.BARCODE_S = M .BARCODE_S (+) AND q.created_time_t = M .created_time_t ORDER BY q.BARCODE_S
) GROUP BY <#if curingmachinecode_s??> curingmachinecode_s, :curingmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if buildinmachinecode_s??> buildinmachinecode_s, :buildinmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if dynaBalancemachinecode_s??> dynaBalancemachinecode_s, :dynaBalancemachinecode_s, </#if> curingspeccode_s,description

select count(1) from (select <#if curingmachinecode_s??> curingmachinecode_s, :curingmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if buildinmachinecode_s??> buildinmachinecode_s, :buildinmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if dynaBalancemachinecode_s??> dynaBalancemachinecode_s, :dynaBalancemachinecode_s, </#if> curingspeccode_s,description, count(1) speccount, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dpha1, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dpha1pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tdda1, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tdda1pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) a1, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) a1pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dpha, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dphapinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tdda, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tddapinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) a, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253007' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) apinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dpha0, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dpha0pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tdda0, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tdda0pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) a0, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) a0pinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S ='4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) dphd, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN BALANCE_TOTAL_RANK_S = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) dphdpinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s ='4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) tddd, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN Ro_Total_Rank_s = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) tdddpinlv, SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) erji, decode(substr((100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),1,1),'.','0'||(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%'),(100*round( SUM(CASE WHEN grade_code_s ='253006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )/count(1),4)||'%')) erjipinlv from ( SELECT DISTINCT T.BARCODE_S, ( SELECT MACHINECODE_S FROM at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M1 WHERE M1.TYREBARCODE_S = M .TYREBARCODE_S AND M1.PROESS_S = '252005' AND ROWNUM<2 ) buildinmachinecode_s, (SELECT MACHINECODE_S FROM at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M1 WHERE M1.TYREBARCODE_S = M .TYREBARCODE_S AND M1.PROESS_S = '252006' AND ROWNUM<2 ) curingmachinecode_s, (SELECT MACHINECODE_S FROM at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M1 WHERE M1.TYREBARCODE_S = M .TYREBARCODE_S AND M1.PROESS_S = '252010' AND ROWNUM<2 ) dynaBalancemachinecode_s, M .MATERIALCODE_S curingspeccode_s, P .DESCRIPTION, t.Balance_Total_Rank_s, t.Ro_Total_Rank_s, t.grade_code_s FROM AT_D_QM_BALANDRRORESULT T, at_c_mm_curing_maintyre M, part P WHERE 1 = 1 AND T .barcode_s = M .TYREBARCODE_S (+) AND M .MATERIALCODE_S = P .part_number (+) AND M .PROESS_S = '252010' AND T .record_flag_s = 'A' <#if begin_created_time??&&end_created_time??> and t.CREATED_TIME_T between to_date(:begin_created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(:end_created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') </#if> <#if curingspeccode_s??> and P .part_number like :curingspeccode_s </#if> ) GROUP BY <#if curingmachinecode_s??> curingmachinecode_s, :curingmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if buildinmachinecode_s??> buildinmachinecode_s, :buildinmachinecode_s, </#if> <#if dynaBalancemachinecode_s??> dynaBalancemachinecode_s, :dynaBalancemachinecode_s, </#if> curingspeccode_s,description)
